channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Catholic Sphere
channel.desc: Doug Keck and his expert panelists discuss whether Vatican II was a ?development? or a ?rupture? of the tradition of what had come before by pastorally trying a new approach. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Defenders Of Faith In Word And Deed
channel.desc: The forty Martyrs of England and Wales were Canonized in 1970, and include St. Cuthbert Maine, John Southwarth, Edmund Arrowsmith, Margaret Clitherow. Many were imprisoned and executed for attending and offering Holy Mass. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Adventure Catechism
channel.desc: Today?s episode explains that Jesus is fully God and Man, and why He had to sacrifice Himself for our sakes. For the Second Coming, Jesus assured His Disciples that He will return to earth accompanied by the Angels. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Lukas Storyteller
channel.desc: Our friends prepare for the talent contest, but Paul gets hurt and has to leave. When Lukas takes him to the doctor, Paul learns from Padre Pio the importance of having a clean soul and offering sufferings to God. (15 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary For Kids
channel.desc: The Little Angel leads kids through the Luminous Mysteries of the Rosary from Jesus' first Miracle at Cana to the Institution of the Eucharist at the Last Supper. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Rosary With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: Mother Angelica and the Poor Clares of Perpetual Adoration recite the Luminous Mysteries of the Rosary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Live Adoration From Ewtn Chapel
channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer answers viewer questions on a wide range of subjects, including: Reason, Faith, Suffering, Virtue, and the Existence of God. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Wild Goose
channel.desc: Fr. Dave Pivonka, TOR, shares how to find solace through the Holy Spirit whenever we feel consumed by daily struggles. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Live
channel.desc: George Weigel discusses the approaching 60th anniversary of the closing of Vatican II, asking if its teachings are still relevant and if its evangelical purpose has been fulfilled. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Baptism of Christ, Wedding at Cana, Proclamation of the Kingdom, Transfiguration and Institution of the Eucharist help us to receive the graces of salvation from Christ through Mary's intercession. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Grab Your Catechism With Fr. Connor
channel.desc: Fr. Connor discusses the ways in which God has made himself known to his people and the ways in which they come to know him, especially through Christ, Scripture,Tradition, and the Teaching Office of the Church. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints For Today
channel.desc: Father John Horgan explores the life of Blessed Marie Drost of the Divine Heart and her special to spread devotion to the Sacred Heart. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Philosophers' Bench
channel.desc: Although the two are often associated, Dr. Kreeft and Dr. Howard explain that the definition of morality extends beyond its usual equation with modesty. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Praying As A Family
channel.desc: Having lost loved ones, these families explain how the Lord helped them choose to trust in Him rather than blame each other. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Live
channel.desc: George Weigel discusses the approaching 60th anniversary of the closing of Vatican II, asking if its teachings are still relevant and if its evangelical purpose has been fulfilled. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Wales The Golden Thread Of Faith
channel.desc: A look at Britain before the arrival of the Romans and how Christianity spread among the Romans and Britons converting them both alike. See how they travelled around the western seas evangelizing as they went. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Life On The Rock
channel.desc: Brian Butler and Adam Fuselier share how their organization, ECHO Community, helps teens and young adults prepare for, discern, and live out their unique vocations to love. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer answers viewer questions on a wide range of subjects, including: Reason, Faith, Suffering, Virtue, and the Existence of God. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Nicaragua: Seigneur, Accorde Nous La Paix
channel.desc: Au Nicaragua, le 18 avril 2018, le pr?sident Daniel Ortega a introduit des r?formes au r?gime de retraite qui ont ?t? rejet?es par la majorit? de la population. Des manifestations contre les r?formes ont ?t? violemment r?prim?es par les forces sp?ciales progouvernementales. Des centaines de gens ont ?t? tu?s et des milliers ont ?t? bless?s. L'?glise, en soignant les bless?s, en prot?geant les dissidents cherchant refuge contre les foules progouvernementales, en travaillant ? la m?diation, est devenue elle-m?me une cible. Le documentaire, ? travers les yeux des dirigeants et des jeunes catholiques, raconte l'histoire de la r?pression politique en cours, les efforts de l'?glise pour apporter la paix et la souffrance des fid?les. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Living Divine Mercy
channel.desc: Fr. Chris differentiates the Novus Ordo from the Latin Mass, explaining their respective histories, validity, and spiritual patrimony. Also learn about the Troops of St. George. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: They Might Be Saints The Martyrs Of La Florida
channel.desc: The extraordinary faith of the Spanish priests and Apalachee natives that were killed while evangelizing and defending their Catholic faith in La Florida. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (18 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Most Precious Blood Of Jesus
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word at the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama, as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Precious Blood of Jesus shed for our salvation. (12 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Called To Communion With Dr. David Anders
channel.desc: Dr. Anders answers questions about the Mass as the Catholic worship service, the armor of God in Ephesians 6:10, how many will be saved, and what the Bible says about the rapture. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Total Consecration To Jesus Through Mary
channel.desc: Fr. Melvin and Fr. Jonathan Dumlao, IVE, analyze St. Louis de Montfort and Pope St. John Paul II?s devotion of total consecration; a Marian devotee discusses her son's heart condition. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother invited viewers to call in to the show as she talks about Heaven and God's awesomeness. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Mary McClernon, O.P. joins to discuss the ways in which we can make ourselves more present to the graces of the Rosary, and become more formed by the mysteries of Jesus? life. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn Pro Life Weekly
channel.desc: EWTN Pro-Life Weekly is a half-hour news and commentary program that covers life issues including abortion, assisted suicide, in vitro fertilization, highlighting the mercy of a culture of life, from a Catholic perspective. This program features interviews, analysis, and actionable steps for viewers to defend the dignity of every human person from conception to natural death. Hosted by Abigail Galv?n. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Great Britain On Location
channel.desc: Brenden Thompson, CEO of Catholic Voices, shares how his organization works to improve the Church's representation in media and give Catholics confidence to share the Church's message. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: In Concert Mozart?s Great Mass In C Minor
channel.desc: An exquisite performance of one of Mozart?s greatest works, his Great Mass in C Minor. Andrew Manze conducts the Bachchor Salzburg and the Camerata Salzburg from Austria in this musical series. (90 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Stations Of The Cross
channel.desc: Using St. Alphonsus Liguori's Prayers as a guide, pray the traditional Stations of the Cross aiding your meditation with live-action images from Christ's Passion. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Explore With The Miracle Hunter
channel.desc: Explore Mission Nombre de Dios at St. Augustine in Florida, site of the United States? first Mass, and home to the canonically-crowned wonderworking statue of Our Lady of La Leche. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Wales The Golden Thread Of Faith
channel.desc: A look at Britain before the arrival of the Romans and how Christianity spread among the Romans and Britons converting them both alike. See how they travelled around the western seas evangelizing as they went. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Global Divine Mercy Chaplet
channel.desc: Children from around the world pray the Chaplet of Divine Mercy. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Way Of The Cross For Kids
channel.desc: Christine, Eva, Joseph and Enrique follow the 14 Stations of the Passion and Death of Our Lord Jesus Christ. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.title: The Holy Rosary With Mother Angelica
channel.desc: Mother Angelica and the Poor Clares of Perpetual Adoration recite the Sorrowful Mysteries of the Rosary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (30 minutes).

channel.title: Chaplet Of Divine Mercy
channel.desc: From the chapel of the National Shrine of the Divine Mercy in Stockbridge, Massachusetts. (20 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Live Adoration From Ewtn Chapel
channel.desc: From Our Lady of the Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (10 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Scripture And Tradition With Fr. Mitch Pacwa
channel.desc: In his LIVE, interactive Bible study, Fr. Mitch begins looking at the second servant song in Isaiah 49, describing the Messiah?s mission, glory, divine origin, and purpose. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Where God Weeps
channel.desc: Mark Riedemann interviews Archbishop Gabriel Blamo Snosio Jubwe about the Church?s commitment to reconciliation efforts after the brutal civil war affecting the country of LIberia. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Rosary In French
channel.desc: The Agony, Scourging, Crowning with Thorns, Carrying the Cross and Crucifixion help us to accept pain and perseverance to the very end. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Finding God In All Things: The Teaching Of Ignatius Loyola On Daily Prayer
channel.desc: Fr. Timothy M. Gallagher, OMV discusses the first step of the Examen, Gratitude, when one notices the gifts that God?s love has given them and to give Him thanks. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Our Father's Plan
channel.desc: Scott Hahn and Jeff Cavins take a look at the first 11 chapters of Scripture, Genesis 1-11 which contain the main themes of the Bible. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Fields And Faith
channel.desc: Nicknamed ?the Ghost? on while on the playing field, former Notre Dame and Oakland Raider Hall of Famer Dave Casper now reminisces how ?the Holy Ghost? played an important role in his life and football career. Hosted by Bob Dolan. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: World Over
channel.desc: Each week, Raymond Arroyo challenges viewers with important political and cultural reporting and analysis of a wide variety of topics of interest to Catholics and people of faith. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn Pro Life Weekly
channel.desc: EWTN Pro-Life Weekly is a half-hour news and commentary program that covers life issues including abortion, assisted suicide, in vitro fertilization, highlighting the mercy of a culture of life, from a Catholic perspective. This program features interviews, analysis, and actionable steps for viewers to defend the dignity of every human person from conception to natural death. Hosted by Abigail Galv?n. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: My Lourdes Faith Journey
channel.desc: After her husband?s death, Majel felt called to form a lay community of Consecrated Widows under Lourdes Volunteers. She and Trish share more about this beautiful sisterhood. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! At Home With Jim And Joy
channel.desc: John Acquaviva is back to speak about the ways in which sports and body image are connected, while tying in the importance of this connection based in Church teachings. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Reasons To Believe
channel.desc: Renowned Biblical scholar, Dr. Scott Hahn and co-host Mike Aquilina debunk the common misconception that faith and science are opposed to one another. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Finding God In All Things: The Teaching Of Ignatius Loyola On Daily Prayer
channel.desc: Fr. Timothy M. Gallagher, OMV discusses the first step of the Examen, Gratitude, when one notices the gifts that God?s love has given them and to give Him thanks. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Ewtn News In Depth
channel.desc: EWTN?s weekly one-hour discussion of current events in the Church, politics, and culture, from a Catholic perspective. Covering the underreported stories and clarifying the Church's position on key teachings, with a focus on the laity's needs and concerns. Hosted by Catherine Hadro. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Journey Home
channel.desc: Casey Chalk, formerly Presbyterian, recounts the experiences that led him to the Catholic Church. Hosted by Marcus Grodi. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Ewtn News Nightly
channel.desc: EWTN News Nightly is our daily news and analysis program presenting breaking Catholic News worldwide, top stories, and daily reports from the White House, Capitol Hill, and Rome. Weekdays at 6 & 9 PM EST. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Daily Mass
channel.desc: The Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word celebrate Mass from the Our Lady of Angels Chapel in Irondale, AL. (LIVE DAILY at 8 am Eastern). (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Holy Land Rosary
channel.desc: Fr. Mitch Pacwa leads the Joyful Mysteries of the Rosary from the actual holy sites and shrines where they took place, bringing the Gospels to life and offering a deeper understanding of the Rosary meditations. (19 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: The Litany Of The Blessed Virgin Mary
channel.desc: Join the Franciscan Missionaries of the Eternal Word as they recite this beautiful prayer in honor of the Blessed Virgin Mary from the Shrine of the Most Blessed Sacrament in Hanceville, Alabama. (11 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saint Paul Of The Cross
channel.desc: An EWTN original docudrama depicts the holy life of St. Paul of the Cross, who overcame a perilous childhood to become the founder of a religious order devoted to the Passion of Jesus. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Total Consecration To Jesus Through Mary
channel.desc: Fr. Melvin and Fr. Thomas Steinke, IVE, explore great Marian saints throughout history; a Marian devotee discusses his battle with leukemia. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Father Spitzer?s Universe
channel.desc: Fr. Spitzer answers viewer questions on a wide range of subjects, including: Reason, Faith, Suffering, Virtue, and the Existence of God. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: new! Women Of Grace
channel.desc: Mary McClernon dives deeply into the effectiveness of the Rosary and the battles it?s won, countries it?s saved, bodies it?s healed, souls it?s rescued, and hearts it?s comforted. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Where God Weeps
channel.desc: Mark Riedemann interviews Archbishop Gabriel Blamo Snosio Jubwe about the Church?s commitment to reconciliation efforts after the brutal civil war affecting the country of LIberia. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Stones And Pearls: The Rosary In The Holy Land
channel.desc: We take you to the ancient walls of the old Temple Mount for the fourth joyful mystery. In the temple, Jesus is presented by Mary and Joseph, eternally declaring God?s mission for his Son to save people from their sins. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Saints And Heroes
channel.desc: The thrilling story of Christopher Columbus?s first sea voyage as a boy to his first step ashore in the Americas. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Massterpiece Donut Shop
channel.desc: When Wendy and Duncan ignore the donut cookbook and create a new flavor so awful that the Donut Man has to close the shop, Fr. Joe teaches the kids why they must follow God's commandments and listen to His Word. (30 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Mother Angelica Live Classics
channel.desc: Mother Angelica sheds light on the Our Father prayer, and why we pray this prayer every day. (60 minutes).

channel.name: EWTN ZA
channel.title: Polycarp
channel.desc: When the Roman proconsul demands all citizens to worship Caesar, Polycarp and other Christians must find the courage to stand up for their faith against the growing threat of persecution. (90 minutes).
